author: lvxing
content: Hi guys, how to get the maxFeePerblobGas value of course?

author: tristan_wilson
content: Hi, I'm Tristan from Offchain labs working on 4844 support for our Nitro node software. We take geth as a dependency and I'm working off of https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/go-ethereum/tree/4844-devnet-6 and I'm looking for how to send the network representation of the blob txs. I found types.BlobTxWithBlobs which looks like the network representation but I can't figure out if there's a way currently to use ethclient.Client to send it.
